title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing reproach in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about a married woman receiving blame in a dream and reprimanding her in a dream indicates many mistakes, negligence and shortcomings, and seeing parents blaming means failure and neglect in household duties and being surrounded by parents. The interpretation of dreaming about seeing reprimands in a dream, and seeing blame from a lover, and accusation or accusation is a warning. From one person to another that he made a mistake and it often comes from a close person, and when we see blame by someone in our dreams, it will certainly carry many meanings and references that we will refer to by explaining the vision of reproach in a dream in detail in this article, the dream interpretation of seeing reproach in a dream. Video of the dream of reproach My opinion: Interpretation of the vision of Ibn Sirin’s reproach. Interpretation of the dream of reprimanding in a dream, as indicated by Ibn Sirin, as evidence of neglect and indifference to the relationship between the family and parents and children. Seeing a parent blaming in a dream is evidence of many sins and failures in performing duties. Dreaming of reprimanding a friend in a dream indicates that the dreamer does not He fulfills his friend's right and needs him badly during this time. The interpretation of blaming parents in a dream shows that the dreamer neglects to meet the demands of his home, mistreats her and falls short of her. Seeing blame and crying in a dream is a sign of relief from stress and sadness. Resolving family problems and disagreements and changing situations for the better Dreaming of seeing a stranger reproach in a dream, and this indicates that the dreamer feels loneliness, injustice, and injustice from those close to him. Read also: Interpretation of a dream to see remorse in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of reproach for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing reprimand in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she wants to change her life and reality for the better, But she fails in this. Dreaming of being reprimanded in a dream is a sign of lack of self-confidence. Feeling of inferiority, lack of self, and inferiority to others. Seeing a lover’s criticism in a single woman’s dream indicates that he has many problems with this person, but he loves him and does not want to lose him. If Seeing family responsibilities in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she does not enjoy her rights and may indicate neglect of duties. Dreaming of seeing people accusing an unmarried woman is evidence that they are talking about her because of a lie. Deception and gossiping about her, and she should beware of those around her. Read also: Interpretation The dream of seeing a lie in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabul. Interpretation of seeing a reproach to a married woman. The interpretation of a dream of reprimand in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is going through many problems and misfortunes that are difficult to solve. Seeing a husband’s reproach in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is suffering from many conflicts and what may arise from it. From problems that may end up in divorce and separation. Dreaming of seeing reprimands in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that she does not care about the health of her fetus, which may put it in danger. Dreaming of reprimands from an upright person in a married woman’s dream is an indication that she will commit many wrong actions. She needs to review herself and repent. Seeing relatives being reprimanded in a married woman’s dream means that she is in a bad psychological state. Because she feels ostracized by her family and friends.

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing a cat in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing a cat in a dream. It is known that Qat is a type of dairy dough popular in Palestine, Jordan and Syria. Also, seeing a cat in a dream is full of visions that come from many, so we present to you, dear followers, all the special meanings and evidence to know the meaning of seeing a cat in a dream, completed by the books of major scholars. . From the interpretation of dreams and visions, we also collected what is the interpretation of seeing a cat for pot, married women, pregnant women and men. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a cat in a dream? Ibn Sirin showed that seeing a cat in a dream is full of dreams and a lot of money. Also, seeing a stuffed cat In a dream, it indicates kindness and wide satisfaction that the dreamer will receive. If you see a cat eating completely in a dream, this means that the dreamer will obtain a lot of halal money. Raising cats in a dream is complete evidence of achieving goals, satisfying desires, and obtaining appropriate opportunities. If You saw yourself buying kittens in a complete dream, it means getting rid of worry and anxiety and entering into a period full of happiness. What is the interpretation of seeing a kitten? Seeing kittens in a dream full of a girl indicates a good, beautiful and stable life that is being enjoyed. Eating kittens in a dream is full The interpretation of seeing a cat preparing or cooking cats in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates kindness and wonderful living. What is the interpretation of seeing a married cat? Seeing a married woman eating herself whole in a dream means that she will get rid of the problems and fears that she suffers from. Also, seeing kittens being raised and presented to the family in a woman’s dream is a good omen and a life that she will enjoy in her life. Seeing a married woman eating A camel in a dream indicates that God will satisfy her desires and also indicates the provision of pregnancy and children. Eating a cat in a dream full of a pregnant woman. The interpretation of seeing a cat in a dream completely for a pregnant woman is generally considered a desirable vision and an indication of an easy and available birth. Seeing a cat completely eating a pregnant woman In a dream, it indicates a significant improvement in her health and the provision of a fair successor for her. Also, dreaming of a small cat being brought and fed to a child indicates that God will give her a child free of disease. What is the interpretation of a cat for a man? Seeing a cat in a dream full of men is a sign of a good life. And the wonderful thing that the dreamer will reap in his life. Eating cats completely in a dream for a young man indicates a lot of money that he will get and a good wife. The interpretation of seeing a cat in a dream full of them in general for men indicates success, luck, and obtaining suitable opportunities. If you had a dream Want to explain it, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing an officer in a dream, complete, and its meaning for a single, married, or pregnant woman?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of the officer seen in the dream and its meaning and what is related to this dream via the Hadouta website The officer and the police are responsible for protecting people from any harm, and the officer in our lives is considered one of the important people whom we must respect and appreciate highly for what they do and risk their lives to protect us. Today we will learn about the complete interpretation of seeing an officer in a dream from scholars who interpret visions and dreams. Such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi and the interpretation of the officer in a dream of Kamil for men, married women, the elderly and pregnant women. If you are interested in the interpretation of the officer in a dream of Kamil, then you should follow the article. Why does an officer dream of Ibn Sirin? Seeing an officer in a dream holding a married man and a woman in his arms is a sign of... The high morals that their children belong to. And to see in a dream that the police were chasing a man is evidence of his love for laziness and neglect, and God knows best. Seeing him running away from the police, according to Ibn Sirin, indicates that the dreamer is a very fearful and terrified person. Seeing pregnancy with an unmarried man in a dream Evidence that he will get married soon, and God knows best. See also: Why dream of joining the army in a full dream? Why does a lone officer dream? Seeing a single female officer in a full dream is a sign that good things will come to her in the near future. Seeing an unmarried police officer in a dream is evidence Full that she will marry someone she loves, and this is good for her, but God knows best. If a girl sees herself in a dream full, she will become an officer. This is evidence of her success and success in her studies or work, and God knows best. Seeing an officer in a dream with a single person is one of the praiseworthy visions associated with kindness and support, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a sergeant in a complete dream? Why does an officer dream of a married woman? Seeing a woman A fully married woman in a dream means that the policeman is a sign of happiness for him. To see a large number of policemen in a married woman’s dream, this dream may indicate some problems for her husband, and God knows best. And to see a full female police officer in a dream walking around her house, this vision may be one of Unpleasant dreams, to show her that there is no good and God knows best. See also: Why does a thief dream in a dream in detail? Why does a pregnant officer dream? Seeing a pregnant officer in a dream means that her due date is approaching. And the complete vision of an officer in a pregnant woman’s dream can show her that she will give birth A child, which is a very beautiful description, and God knows best. A pregnant woman’s dream of an officer arresting her testifies to the fact that she is only afraid of giving birth and there is no need to worry. Interpretations indicate that seeing a policeman in a pregnant woman’s dream may indicate the ease of giving birth to her newborn, and God knows best. See also: Why dream of seeing a bomb in a complete dream? If you have a dream that you want to interpret, leave it in a comment below and our team will answer you.

title: Eagle in a dream / Interpretation of a dream about an osprey for single, married and pregnant women

preview.html: Ibn Sirin says in his famous book (Explanation of Great Dreams) in the thirty-fifth chapter, which is a chapter dedicated to the interpretation of wild, domestic, and waterfowl: An eagle in a dream is a strong man who engages in war, conquest, and aggression. No neighbor or stranger is safe from him, and her chick is a brave boy and a master of rule or influence. Whoever sees torment on the roof of the house or on its corners, he will feel sadness and misery, and will find hostility towards the oppressor. If he dreams that the punishment is chasing him and planting his claws on him, then this indicates Shortness of breath, money or food. If he sees that the punishment is approaching him, or giving him something, or speaking to him with an indescribable word, then this is a sign of kindness and benefit that the dreamer will receive from the owner of wisdom, knowledge, or money. A woman who sees in her dream that she is giving birth or giving birth, meaning that she will give birth to a great boy. And the punishment is similar in interpretation, referring to the offspring of presidents, officers, and soldiers. The rich man who rides the punishment in his sleep faces a financial crisis, while the poor man who sees in a dream as if the punishment is flying over a height or a high altitude, this means better livelihood, God willing. Interpretation of punishment in Dream of an unmarried woman: Punishment in a dream of an unmarried woman indicates a powerful person who has money or honorable origin. If she sees in a dream that the punishment is standing on her right hand, then she will love you as a son-in-law of high status and standing. If he enters her house and flies in it and does not fall to the ground, then the dream indicates that he heard good news, and if he sees that he is following him or following him, it is as if in waking life he is receiving a problem or something he wants. A beautiful eagle is a symbol of prestige and we wish you success. Interpretation of an eagle in a married woman’s dream: If a married woman sees that an eagle falls on prey like a rabbit, then grabs it with its claws and flies away, this is an interpretation of losing something valuable or an important opportunity in life. A dream about good livelihood is like the value of a game. Punishment in a married woman’s dream indicates victory or victory and success. In the visions, he is praised for slaughtering them, cooking their meat, and eating them, because this is an expression of improving resources and living, and the osprey’s nest shows the vision of the immunity of the home and family. Interpretation of punishment in a dream of a pregnant woman. All predatory animals in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate a male child, and punishment often indicates The big boy in the future, which is a symbol of the imam, the preacher, the leader, and the punishment in all cases indicates a good or pious boy. If a pregnant woman sees him secreting eggs, building a nest, or flying over the horizon.

title: Interpretation of a dream about killing a gecko in a dream by Ibn Sirin for married and single women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about killing a gecko in a dream is an animal that belongs to the reptile family, as geckos are found in different countries of the world with different names and different colors, including the ability to change their colors to camouflage. Enemies and some interpretation scholars believe that seeing a gecko in a dream has many good and positive meanings, such as kindness and food, as Ibn Sirin worked hard to interpret this dream and clarify the explanations and interpretations it contains, and we will present them to you in the process. Our article is the most important interpretations given regarding the vision of killing a gecko in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of killing a goose by Ibn Sirin. There are many indications related to the vision of killing a gecko in a dream, some of which contain praiseworthy meanings and some of which contain unpleasant meanings. Among the most prominent things that the scholar Ibn Sirin formulated regarding this dream is the following: Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the stomach in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s bad morals, committing sins and immorality, and following many false paths. Seeing a leper spreading his poison on the dreamer in a dream is evidence of the presence of a fierce enemy. is close to the dreamer and has feelings of malice and hatred and wishes to harm him, so the dreamer must be careful, reasonable and wise to be able to confront him. If a man sees in a dream that a leper is running quickly without being able to catch him, this means that the dreamer will enter into an unfair competition with His colleagues, and one of his colleagues will try to take away his achievements at work. See also: Interpretation of a dream of a beautiful girl laughing in a dream for single women, married women, and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about killing a gecko for a single woman. Seeing a gecko in a dream is one of the disturbing visions that causes anxiety and discomfort when seeing it. This vision can symbolize good things or symbolize the occurrence of bad events in the dreamer's life. Among the most important evidence obtained from seeing a gecko killed in one dream is the following: Seeing a gecko killed in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the end of all the problems and disagreements that this girl suffers from in her life, whether they are related to her work or her exposure to a financial crisis. Vision Killing a gecko in an unmarried girl’s dream is good news for a new life full of optimism, joy, and happiness. If a single woman dreams that she is killing a gecko, this is evidence that she will get rid of a very big problem that has affected her life. The interpretation of a dream about killing a gecko in a dream for a married woman varies. The interpretation of this dream depends on the dreamer’s social status, the color of the gecko, its location, and the nature of the events that occurred in the dream. Below we list the most important interpretations given regarding killing a gecko in a married man’s dream: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is killing geckos and reminding people in her real life of bad things, this indicates that good will not come and is evidence that she will be severely punished as a result of her actions. If a woman sees A married woman is experiencing disagreements with her husband and in a dream she kills a gecko, this is evidence that she will get rid of all disagreements and problems without causing harm or negative impact in her life. title: Interpretation of a dream about potatoes for a married woman

preview.html: But this dream can have many interpretations, so in this article we will show you interpretations of potatoes in a dream. Interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream about a man and its meaning. If a man dreams that he is working on growing potatoes in his home, this is evidence of this person’s diligence in developing his financial situation. Or it may be evidence that he is seeking to find a job of his own. Dreaming of a man planting potatoes in a dream could mean that he will enjoy success and prosperity in his work as a result of his diligence in it. It is important to know that if someone sees in a dream frying potatoes in oil, this dream is interpreted in relation to exposure The dreamer is experiencing problems and crises in his life. In fact, a man’s dream is that he is eating potatoes and he is happy. It indicates that this man is living a happy, stable and satisfied life. On the contrary, a man is dreaming that he is eating potatoes and they taste bitter. This indicates that he is exposed to problems, obstacles and fears and he cannot get rid of them. As for watching a man buy potatoes, it indicates the emergence of crises between the man and his wife, so he should be careful. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing potatoes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about potatoes for a married woman. In the case of a married woman who dreams of potatoes, this indicates the presence of problems and difficulties in her life with her husband. In fact, Seeing a married woman buying potatoes to store them indicates that she will face a lot of problems in her private life, which may extend for a long time. A married woman interprets a dream about cooking potatoes. Evidence that she is exposed to illness, but God will heal her soon. A married woman dreams that she is eating potatoes and that they taste good. She says She is satisfied and comfortable in her life. As for seeing a married woman in a dream selling potatoes in the market. title: Interpretation of seeing an exam in a dream in detail

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribed Fans Interpretation of seeing exams in a dream in detail, which differs in interpretations depending on the psychological state of the person. In this case, the delay in the examination date indicates the weakness of the dreamer’s personal life, and this explains how some family and work matters are incorrectly arranged, causing stress and tension. This vision also shows the individual’s miserable failure in his work, and the great contribution to the loss of opportunities available to him, and failure. In achieving compatibility with the fatal opportunities on which it is based.Interpretation of a dream about an exam by Al-NabulsiInterpretation of a dream about an exam in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi, who interpreted this dream as the presence of great ambiguity in it and the dreamer’s lack of self-confidence, which constantly confused him with his work. In the following interpretation: Explain that if you fail to get the correct answer, something bad and unexpected will happen, and God knows best. Recurring a dream about an exam is strong evidence of a person being tested by God and the extent of his patience and acceptance of fate and destiny, which is the basic factor in a person’s life. And in the case of Passing exams is evidence of God Almighty’s satisfaction with man and his patience in accepting difficulties and misfortunes. Also, if the colors of the exam papers are white, this indicates purity and lasting pleasure. Interpretation of a dream about individual exams: A dream about taking an exam in a dream for an unmarried woman is interpreted as the true test of her professional life and the extent of her patience. And its acceptance of God’s rule. It is considered one of the causes of pessimism, as it indicates an extension of the period of celibacy and the inability to find a suitable partner, which leads to an academic and personal delay in his life. But if you pass the exams in a dream and achieve the desired results, this means that the share is coming and with it will be replaced by joy. And happiness about the past. Interpretation of a dream about exams for a married woman. The interpretation of a dream about exams in a dream for a married woman varies according to the characteristics of the woman, such as: If you dream that you failed and did not pass the exam, then this is a sign of stability and marital happiness. In the event that there is no pregnancy and the married woman dreams of undergoing the examination, this is the best evidence. However, pregnancy will happen soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about an examination for a pregnant woman: In the case of pregnancy, dreaming about an examination in a dream represents a major psychological obstacle for the pregnant woman and suspicious thoughts passing through her mind that cause her anxiety and insecurity. If she passes the test safely, this means that the birth is going smoothly. But if you fail or stumble in the answer, this indicates that the birth period will be difficult, but it will be safe for the mother and the fetus. Dear followers, this is how I gave you the interpretation of the vision in general. If you have a question or a dream that you want to interpret, feel free to ask your question in the comment box and we will reply to you as soon as possible. We also invite you to follow our pages on social networking sites, Facebook, Twitter, and others, to get everything related to the interpretation of dreams exclusively. We also wish you sweet dreams and a good night’s sleep, as long as you are well, dear, in God’s name. .

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a room or a toilet in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a room or a toilet in a dream, as it is known that the room is one of the most important parts that includes every home in this life, and seeing it in a dream is considered a good and beautiful vision, especially since the room in real life is a place of rest, which indicates safety and stability, and seeing it in The dream includes a wide range of interpretations, and they vary based on the details you see in the dream and based on the social situation of the viewer. In this article, we will discuss to clarify the interpretation of the dream of seeing a room or a room in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a room or a toilet in a dream. It is worth noting that seeing a room or a room is considered one of Good visions, which carry many positive and good associations and interpretations that differ from one viewer to another, and in this paragraph we explain. The interpretation of the dream of seeing a room or a toilet in a dream. It is also: Seeing a room in a dream is a sign of security, stability and psychological comfort. In addition to that, seeing rooms Spacious in a dream. It is evidence of the fulfillment of dreams and desires and an indication of acceptance and respect among people. But if narrow rooms were seen in the dream. This dream is a sign of distress and suffering in the dreamer’s life. Also seeing a strange room in a dream. It is evidence of the fulfillment of dreams. And desires, it indicates prestige. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see jahamah in a dream for single women, married women, pregnant women, and men. Interpretation of an empty room in a dream for a married woman. Although this vision can be directed to many people, it can also include many interpretations and explanations. , which according to many commentators varies according to the social position of the viewer, and in this context we explain. The interpretation of an empty room in a dream for a married woman is also: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is sitting in a clean and tidy room. This dream shows the psychological comfort and peace that this woman feels It is also evidence of the collapse of anxiety and the alleviation of the distress that the woman has suffered recently. Whereas if a married woman sees many rooms in her dream, the dream is a sign that this woman will get rid of all the problems and fears that she suffers from in life. However, if a married woman sees in The dream is that she enters the beautiful room, and it is in happy colors. This dream is a sign of good luck, good news and upcoming happiness. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing divorce in a dream for a married and single woman. Interpretation of seeing yourself entering a strange room in a dream. It is one of the strange visions that some may see in their dreams. It involves many different explanations and interpretations, and they may be good and good interpretations, and here we explain in detail. The interpretation of seeing yourself entering a strange room in a dream is also: To see yourself entering a strange room in a dream, to feel anxious and tense because of that. It is considered evidence that the dreamer He loses comfort and also shows disturbance in his circumstances. Also, the vision of entering the strange room, and the dreamer’s sense of security. This vision is evidence

title: What is the interpretation of seeing complete self-defense in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website offers you an interpretation of dreams about self-defense. We have collected for you these interpretations from the main books of scholars who interpret dreams and visions. We also presented to you, our followers, everything related to the interpretation of the vision of self-defense by beating, as well as the interpretation of the dream of self-defense with a weapon, as well as the interpretation of the dream “Protect the person you love.” We also collected for you, my dear, the interpretation of how someone is killed in a dream. If you are interested in the interpretation of this dream, just follow the article. Why dream of self-defense being beaten? The interpretation of self-defense in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s self-confidence and hard work in his career. In the same way, seeing self-defense in a dream indicates the dreamer’s closeness to Almighty God and the goodness of his heart. Self-defense by defeating the enemy shows that the dreamer has gotten rid of the enemy and entered a stage of calm and stability. Why dream of self-defense with a gun? Dreaming of someone stabbed to death with a knife in self-defense means getting rid of worries and getting rid of sadness. Killing an animal with a gun in a dream Complete self-defense means success, success, and achieving goals and desires. Killing a husband with a knife in a married woman’s dream means love and mutual care between spouses, and being relieved of their troubles. Why dream of protecting a loved one? Protection of a loved one is completed in a dream by someone who says that he will get rid of his problems and bring him closer. Of the happy wedding day. This vision also shows the joy and happiness they will experience as well as the good news when they hear the gospel. Protecting one’s wife in a dream is full of visions that testify to the love and strength that characterizes the husband in his life. Seeing a young man in a dream protecting his bride from his family indicates reconciliation Between them and the date of their happy marriage is near. What does it mean to fully protect someone in a dream? To dream of protecting a criminal and corrupt person means the death of benefit, security, and protection from the dreamer in the afterlife due to his actions. Seeing completely protecting innocent people in a dream also indicates comfort and blessing, as well as evidence of the existence of the oppressed. Those around him. Why dream of protecting honor? What dreams of protecting a woman’s honor in a complete dream indicates the approaching date of her engagement and marriage to a strong and caring person. In the same way, seeing honor protection in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate purity and chastity, as well as liberating the dreamer from all Adversity and worries.In addition, protecting a married man’s honor indicates his wife’s strong love and support for him, with many blessings and happy events in their lives.If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comments below and our team will answer you.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of my sister’s dreams that I was pregnant in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of my sister’s dream that I was pregnant in a dream according to Ibn Sirin in detail, and Muhammad ibn Sirin is a sign of the interpretation of dreams among Muslims and the best of scholars who turn to Muslims in a dream when a Muslim dreams about what he found in searching for an interpretation of a dream, and he heard from many companions, including Abu Hurairah ibn Abbas, may God be pleased with them, and all Muslims trust him; Because of the large number of scholars in science and knowledge. He was devoted to knowledge at the age of 76 years when he died in 729 AD, and in this article we will give you the interpretation of my sister, who dreamed that I was pregnant. She is a kind and energetic girl who constantly strives to achieve her goals and that God will grant her a livelihood as wide as she receives. A wonderful job in a good place. There is another indication that her husband will enjoy a happy life regardless of her sister, who will receive a lot of money in the coming days, or that the relationship with her husband will be enjoyable and smooth without problems and disagreements with her husband. Seeing a woman I know pregnant in a dream. Interpretation of my sister I dreamed that I was pregnant and single, which indicates your desire for a decent life blessed with kindness and livelihood in the future, or someone will come to marry her in the coming period and have a new prince who will fill their lives with happiness. This means that the vision sees her sister in a happy and beautiful life that is not overshadowed by any obstacles that affect his life. She will live an ideal life away from the problems and pressures that affect her. The interpretation of dreams is that my sister is pregnant and married. The two translators explained that the interpretation of my sister’s dream that I am pregnant shows that the woman lives a happy life away from pressures and problems, and that her sister is strong and has ambitions and self-confidence to overcome all obstacles, which is that she is a girl who trusts herself. And her morals. It shows that the woman will soon learn about the news of her pregnancy. Obtaining a very important position or job. Overcome your family problems. If the woman is unhappy after the dream, this indicates that she is worried and afraid about the future. There is good news and good news within days. I dreamed That my sister is pregnant alone. My sister’s interpretation of my dream that I was pregnant with a single girl shows many pieces of evidence depending on the situation that the girl went through during the dream. Wishes and desires will come true soon, God willing. The girl has gone through many difficulties in her life, whether on the family or work level. If the dream In the last months of pregnancy, this indicates that the girl is going through many responsibilities in her life. The girl’s fears will soon disappear and she will begin a better life. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of dreams I dreamed that I gave birth to a girl. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for another person. Interpretation of my sister dreamed that I was pregnant by a stranger. Single women, indicating that happy days are coming for the girl and that God will give her a prosperous and happy life. Happy and smiling in a dream, a sign of a lot of money or a promotion at work to a higher position. Interpretation of a dream about my sister being pregnant with a single womanInterpretation of my sister dreaming that I was pregnant for a single woman indicates the sister’s attempt to pursue her goals
